thread.title: `Kill Dil` girl Parineeti Chopra turns 27

title: `Kill Dil` girl Parineeti Chopra turns 27
text: `Kill Dil` girl Parineeti Chopra turns 27 Thursday, 22 October 2015 (9 minutes ago) * New Delhi , Oct.22 (ANI): Bollywood diva Parineeti Chopra, who has seen many ups- downs in her acting career, turns 27 today.* New Delhi, Oct.22 (ANI): Bollywood diva Parineeti Chopra, who has seen many ups- downs in her acting career, turns 27 today. The 'Daawat-e-Ishq' actress took to her Twitter page to thank her fans for their warm wishes and wrote, "Guyss thank you for your wishes in advance. Will make my bday even more special :) love you all !" Wishing the 'Kill Dil' actress, Ayushmann Khurrana tweeted, "Happy bday @ParineetiChopra!! Keep shining!!" The actress got Filmfare Award for Maneesh Sharma's directorial 'Ladies vs Ricky Bahl' and has around six films to her credit. Parineeti has lately worked on her body and has stunned everyone with her surprise transformation from bubbly to skinny. (ANI)
